metadata.title: Lightning to HDMI Adapter, 5 in 1 USB OTG Camera Digital AV Hub Adapter, SD & TF Card Reader, 1080P Sync Screen Converter with Charger Cable for iPhone 12/11/iPad/USB on HDTV/Projector/Monitor (White)
features: 【5-in-1 Upgraded Multiport Adapter】This Apple MFi Certified 5 in 1 Lightning to OTG Digital AV Adapter includes HDMI port, SD Card port, TF port, USB port and Female 8pin charging port. For the SD/TF/ USB, please use only one of them one time. But the HDMI port and USB port can also be used at the same time! When the HDMI and USB port(or SD or TF) be used at the same, supports mirroring of what is display on your USB flash drive(or SD or TF) too!

【1080P Audio & Video HD Synchronous Display】This 4K Lightning to HDMI Digital Adapter supports mirroring of what is display on your iPhone (including video,TV program,apps,website,movies,games,pics,etc) to your HDMI equipped devices to enjoy the larger and clearer screen up to 1080P HD output. (Note: Our upgraded Adapter just when your iPhone battery less 20% or work no stable, please connect the charging port to charge. If your battery is enough, don't need to connect the charging port!)

【USB Fast Data Transfer Speed】With the USB Camera Reader port, it's easy to transfer photos and videos from your digital camera to your iPhone. It supports connect USB peripherals like hubs, Ethernet adapter, audio/MIDI interfaces and card readers. 1. For iOS 9.2-12.4 users, only supports one-way transmission from USB flash drive to the iPhone/iPad. 2. For updated iOS 13+ users, supports two-way transmission ( transfer not only pictures and videos, but also Word, Excel, PDF, etc.）

【Plug and Play, Lightweight Design】This Apple Lightning to OTG Digital AV Adapter doesn't need to download third-party apps or internet connection, just plug and play, without worry about privacy! It also adopts original high performance chip to ensure the high speed transmission. It also in small size, short lightning cable, lightweight, easy to pack along, which allows you to carry it in your bag everywhere.

【Certification and Compatible System】This Apple MFi Certified 5 in 1 Lightning to OTG Digital AV Adapter is compatible with iPhone/iPad/iPod like iPhone 12/12 Max/12 Pro/12 Pro Max/11/11 Pro/11 Pro Max/Xs/6/6plus etc, iPad air/iPad with rethina display/iPad mini, iPod Touch 5th gen and iPod nano 7th gen etc. It supports all iOS 9.2-14+. If you have any questions about this Lightning to HDMI & OTG Adapter, please feel free to contact us, we will make the best products and services for you!
description: How to Use: HDMI Port: 1. Connect the Adapter HDMI port to your TV HDMI port via a HDMI cable and select the TV signal source to be HDMI. 2. Connect the Adapter with your iPhone/iPad, wait about 20 seconds. 3. The charging port connect to AC adapter(5V,2A) via an apple USB charger cable. (Note: If your battery is enough, don't need to connect the charging port!) 4. Slide up to your iPhone/iPad and click screen mirroring choose "Air OTG Adapter".
